title: Hosting Climate Summit Is Both Opportunity and Risk for Egypt
description: The COP27 meeting next week allows a debt-wracked African country to champion climate needs of poorer nations. But it also puts Egypt under scrutiny.
dc:creator: Vivian Yee
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:credit: Laura Boushnak for The New York Times
media:description: The idyllic Red Sea resort town of Sharm el-Sheikh is set to host the 27th annual United Nations-sponsored climate summit, known as COP27.
